description: Mentioned only by Williams, who says: �The Trécyne at St Séverin, Paris, 1626, was probably a Traversine or small flute 2'.�.
examplesDescription: Osiris contains two examples of Traversine, and none of Trécyne. Contributions welcome.

examples.name: Traversine 2', Hoofdwerk; St. Gorikskerk, Brussels, Belgium; Balders 1686.
Traversine 2', Manual I; Cathedrale, Metz, France; Treves 1536. Reconstructed by Garnier in 1982.
